name: Koi wa Balance: Tatoeba K-kun no Tabou na Ichinichi Hen
overview: Koi wa Balance: Tatoeba K-kun no Tabou na Ichinichi Hen is a Downloadable game for the Satellaview that was first broadcast on January 27, 1996. The game is a board game and it features, among other characters, both Gaspar and Johnny from the earlier Square title, Chrono Trigger.
